column1: An error occurred while clearing the Fastly CDN.
column2: An error occurred while clearing the Fastly CDN.

column1: Domain or IP list separted by semicolon (e.g. host1;127.0.0.1)
column2: Domain or IP list separted by semicolon (e.g. host1;127.0.0.1)

column1: Pass X-headers for debugging purpose to the client and log purge requests to /var/log/varnish_cache.log (ensure developer log is enabled).
column2: Pass X-headers for debugging purpose to the client and log purge requests to /var/log/varnish_cache.log (ensure developer log is enabled).

column1: Purge CMS page's cache item on save
column2: Purge CMS page's cache item on save

column1: Purge categorie's cache item on save
column2: Purge categorie's cache item on save

column1: Purge product's cache item on save
column2: Purge product's cache item on save

column1: Remove selected cache items in external Fastly CDN.
column2: Remove selected cache items in external Fastly CDN.

column1: Set a TTL of "0" for certain routes/actions (e.g. checkout, catalog_product_view). Use one per line.
column2: Set a TTL of "0" for certain routes/actions (e.g. checkout, catalog_product_view). Use one per line.

column1: Set a TTL of "0" for every request
column2: Set a TTL of "0" for every request

column1: TTL for cached pages in seconds (e.g. "1800" = page cache is valid for 30 minutes).
column2: TTL for cached pages in seconds (e.g. "1800" = page cache is valid for 30 minutes).

column1: TTL for cached pages in seconds for certain routes/actions (e.g. Route:"catalog_product_view", TTL:"7200").
column2: TTL for cached pages in seconds for certain routes/actions (e.g. Route:"catalog_product_view", TTL:"7200").

column1: The JavaScript/CSS cache has been cleaned on the Varnish servers.
column2: The JavaScript/CSS cache has been cleaned on the Varnish servers.

column1: The Fastly CDN has been cleaned.
column2: The Fastly CDN has been cleaned.

column1: The catalog image cache has been cleaned on the Varnish servers.
column2: The catalog image cache has been cleaned on the Varnish servers.

column1: Fastly CDN for "%s" has been purged.
column2: Fastly CDN for "%s" has been purged.

column1: Fastly CDN for the product's categories has been purged.
column2: Fastly CDN for the product\'s categories has been purged.

column1: The URL's "%s" cache has been cleaned.
column2: The URL's "%s" cache has been cleaned.

column1: Update Varnish VCL with design exceptions by using the following snippet:
column2: Update Varnish VCL with design exceptions by using the following snippet:

column1: To contact Fastly support please click here.
column2: To contact Fastly support please click here.

column1: Admin port of the Varnish server (e.g. 6082)
column2: Admin port of the Varnish server (e.g. 6082)

column1: Download VCL file reflecting current config settings.
column2: Download VCL file reflecting current config settings.

column1: Enable Crawler for Fastly CDN heating.
column2: Enable Crawler for Fastly CDN heating.

column1: TTL in seconds for certain blocks.
column2: TTL in seconds for certain blocks.

column1: TTL for ESI blocks in seconds (e.g. "1800" = block cache within Varnish is valid for 30 minutes).
column2: TTL for ESI blocks in seconds (e.g. "1800" = block cache within Varnish is valid for 30 minutes).

column1: Enable ESI functionality. Deactivate Magento Enterprise Page Cache if activated before enabling ESI.
column2: Enable ESI functionality. Deactivate Magento Enterprise Page Cache if activated before enabling ESI.

column1: Highlights ESI block with red border and echos ESI block URL.
column2: Highlights ESI block with red border and echos ESI block URL.

column1: Pass all ESI requests through Varnish to the backend without caching them.
column2: Pass all ESI requests through Varnish to the backend without caching them.

column1: When set to "No" block logic gets simplified to get better hit rates. However the content might slightly differ from native Magento block.
column2: When set to "No" block logic gets simplified to get better hit rates. However the content might slightly differ from native Magento block.

column1: Secure requests can be problematic as ESI processing with Varnish requires SSL offloading. Leave this option to "yes" to disable ESI blocks for secure requests.
column2: Secure requests can be problematic as ESI processing with Varnish requires SSL offloading. Leave this option to "yes" to disable ESI blocks for secure requests.

column1: Show a dialog to select target store. Choose Yes to show CMS block content in a modal window. Choose No to redirect.
column2: Show a dialog to select target store. Choose Yes to show CMS block content in a modal window. Choose No to redirect.

column1: Mapping of countries/stores to redirect to. You can use * as a wildcard.
column2: Mapping of countries/stores to redirect to. You can use * as a wildcard.

column1: Mapping of countries/static CMS blocks to display. You can use * as a wildcard.
column2: Mapping of countries/static CMS blocks to display. You can use * as a wildcard.
